Class ScreenSettings

java.lang.Object
model.ScreenSettings
public class ScreenSettings extends Object
!VERY! important model, only contains field regarding the game screen size. since the game depends on x and y calculations, MODIFYING THESE NUMBERS WILL BREAK THE GAME LOGIC.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    MAX_SCREEN_COL
    total cols allowed in width (32 cols)
    static final int
    MAX_SCREEN_ROW
    total rows allowed in height (16 rows)
    static final int
    ORIGINAL_TILE_SIZE
    original tile size (16 pixels)
    static final int
    SCALE
    scaling factor of the original tile size (3)
    static final int
    SCREEN_HEIGHT
    total screen height (in pixels) based on the maximum screen rows * tile size.
    static final int
    SCREEN_WIDTH
    total screen width (in pixels) based on the maximum screen cols * tile size.
    static final int
    TILE_SIZE
    real tile size (shown on screen) (48x48 px tiles)
